item.title: Leaking from drain, 1st January
item.description:
Outside No 49 and 49A there is a drain leaving water over the pavement and into the road which can be dangerous if it freezes one of your employers came and lifted the drain cover and did something not sure what but it as been leaking every since it froze and turned into ice the last 2 days
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Eastern Way, Lower Belvedere, Greater London

item.title: Rubbish bags dumped on Rushgrove street again, 1st January
item.description:
There is a pile of rubbish bags that have been left on Rush Grove street. The whole street is also covered in litter as the road is not regularly on the route of the employees who pick up litter. There is also broken glass and a bottle of urine that has been left on the pavement.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Artillery Place, Woolwich
